name: Moto Racer 2016 Madness - Extreme highway racing game for ace riders
name_original: Moto Racer 2016 Madness - Extreme highway racing game for ace riders
description:
Moto Racer 2016 Madness is super fast bike racing 3D game. You can play in your favorite city environment or in fast paced and busy highway.

Collect coins as much as you can to unlock super giant bikes available in bikes shop. Boost your speed with super fast nitro NO2 to crush the traffic.

Game is integrated with global leaderboard, you can compete with racers all over the world. Race harder, beat the traffic and showcase your result on your Facebook timeline.
